ApproxsimClient.object
Class SimpleShape

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.object.ApproxsimObject
      ApproxsimClient.object.Shape
          ApproxsimClient.object.SimpleShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transferable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Circle, Segmented
public abstract class SimpleShape
extends Shape

A simpleshape defines a contigous set of two-dimensional points.

Method Detail

getPolygon

public Polygon getPolygon(double error)
Returns a (possibly nonsimple) approximative Polygon representation of this simpleshape. N.B will only recalculate if old cached value has a higher error than the previous.

Parameters:
error - the maximum distance between the approximation and the closest point on the line.

isHole

public boolean isHole()
Returns true if this SimpleShape is a hole.

setHole

public void setHole(boolean hole)
Sets the hole status of this SimpleShape

Parameters:
hole - true means this shape is a hole.

public void orderPreservingAdd(ApproxsimObject part)

getAddActionGroupForListDec

protected static ActionGroup getAddActionGroupForListDec(ApproxsimList listToAddTo,
                                                         Declaration declaration)
Convenience method for creating the ActionGroup for adding elements to a list. Goes through the descendant types of the type of this list and groups actions according to that.

Parameters:
listToAddTo - The ApproxsimList that the elements should be added to.
declaration - The Declaration of the ApproxsimList to create add actions for. May be the Declaration of the ApproxsimList to add to or in recursive calls a Declaration with a type that is a descendant to the type of the list.
Returns:
An ActionGroup with all the add actions that applies to this list grouped by type.
